title: Taking A Look At Poliomyelitis
cleaned_text:
The beneficiaries, Master Emmanuel Maduabuchi Chukwu and Master Chukwuebuka Udoye, locally manufactured two aircraft helicopter and jet fighter and click MP3 radio set, respectively, in the state. Ugwuanyi announced the scholarships when he received the two students at the Government House Enugu on Tuesday, to appreciate their talents, skills and sheer dexterity in promoting technology-based innovation in the state.

Expressing his delight, Gov. Ugwuanyi requested the state commissioner of education, Prof. Uche Eze, to immediately present to the state executive council EXCOa memo for the approval of the sum of N million for the construction of more classroom blocks in Government Technical Colleges GTCs in the state.

The young student from Anambra state, we give you N, Ugwuanyi said. In his remarks Eze applauded Ugwuanyi for the premium his administration places on education in the state as well as his gesture to meet with the students to encourage and appreciate their talents.

Your Excellency, your schools are working; this is just one of the many things that are going on in our technical colleges. Thank you for encouraging our young talents.

Responding, the two students, Chukwu and Udoye, expressed their deepest joy and gratitude to Gov. Ugwuanyi for honouring them, adding that the encouragement and support from the governor, which they never expected, will spur them to fully actualize their dreams. They asked God to continue to bless the governor.

Levi Abonyi; and the mother of Master Chukwu, Mrs. Grace Chukwu, witnessed the event.]
